alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 31 at 6:38PM EST until December 31 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: .An ice jam may cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding continues to be possible through Sunday morning on the Buffalo area creeks due to increased runoff from snowmelt and rainfall. Minor flooding also continues to be possible in urban areas where piles of snow are blocking drains. * WHERE...Erie County. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
